name: Black velvet robes
data: It decreases the users strength poorly.
It decreases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users wisdom an average amount.
It increases the users intelligence noticably.
It has tiny armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration incredibly.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
